https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gH7VIiiduGPIqttTANgRLLRJJfY.jpg The film revolves around a Hindu man (Paresh Rawal) who goes through an identity crisis when he discovers he was adopted as a son in a Hindu family but was born in a Muslim family. The journey starts with finding his real father. Dharam Sankat Mein
